query:
-- إصلاح جدول mosque_requests
ALTER TABLE mosque_requests 
  MODIFY COLUMN currentStage VARCHAR(100),
  MODIFY COLUMN status VARCHAR(50),
  MODIFY COLUMN currentResponsibleDepartment VARCHAR(100),
  MODIFY COLUMN programType VARCHAR(100),
  MODIFY COLUMN serviceType VARCHAR(100);

-- إصلاح جدول request_stage_tracking
ALTER TABLE request_stage_tracking
  MODIFY COLUMN stageName VARCHAR(100),
  MODIFY COLUMN stageCode VARCHAR(100),
  MODIFY COLUMN subStageCode VARCHAR(100),
  MODIFY COLUMN status VARCHAR(50),
  MODIFY COLUMN assignedDepartment VARCHAR(100);

-- إصلاح جدول request_history
ALTER TABLE request_history
  MODIFY COLUMN fromStage VARCHAR(100),
  MODIFY COLUMN toStage VARCHAR(100),
  MODIFY COLUMN fromStatus VARCHAR(50),
  MODIFY COLUMN toStatus VARCHAR(50),
  MODIFY COLUMN actionType VARCHAR(100);
